title: Notice of Removal of Lawyer for Child

pages.name: Notice of Removal of Lawyer for Child
pages.description:
Are you a lawyer no longer representing a child in a family law case?
Rule 162 of the Provincial Court Family Rules requires you to file a Notice of Removal of Lawyer for Child in Form 41 when you stop representing a child and serve a copy on each other party as soon as possible.

Use this pathway to complete your Notice of Removal of Lawyer for Child.
